remarks: Associativity of natural transformation composition.  Remark 6.14(b) in [Adamek] p. 87.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fucass.q $e |- Q = ( C FuncCat D ) $.
fucass.n $e |- N = ( C Nat D ) $.
fucass.x $e |- .xb = ( comp ` Q ) $.
fucass.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( F N G ) ) $.
fucass.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( G N H ) ) $.
fucass.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( H N K ) ) $.
fucass $p |- ( ph -> ( ( T ( <. G , H >. .xb K ) S ) ( <. F , G >. .xb K ) R ) = ( T ( <. F , H >. .xb K ) ( S ( <. F , G >. .xb H ) R ) ) ) $.
